Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class SingleIsland

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.modelObservables.MotherNatureMovementObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Island
it.polimi.ingsw.model.SingleIsland
public class SingleIsland extends Island
SingleIsland is an Island implementation that represent a non-unified island in the game
